data.eml:eml: Description of the male of Dolomedes raptoroides Zhang, Zhu & Song, 2004 (Araneae: Lycosoidea: Pisauridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cruz Da Silva, Estevam L., Gibbons, Anne, Sierwald, Petra (2015): Description of the male of Dolomedes raptoroides Zhang, Zhu & Song, 2004 (Araneae: Lycosoidea: Pisauridae). Zootaxa 3946 (1): 139-145, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3946.1.8
